page.title: 10MIDDLE IVYTHORN FARM
page.content: {LIVESTOCK}: Mr Symes has 460 acres of land, upon which he rears heifers for beef, in addition to a considerable number of sheep, a brood mare and a foal. He used to keep a few horses for point to pointing. They have shown sheep at the Bath + West Show. {CROPS}: Apart from hay for their livestock, this farm also grows many cereal foods eg. wheat, barley, oats and maize.About 60% of it is sold. The rest of it is used on the farm. {MACHINERY}: This farm has four tractors, the newest of which is two years old. They only buy MASSEY FERGUSON machinery.Apart from tractors this farm has fertilizers, harvesters, bailers, almost any kind of machinery needed for cultivating crops.The most recent part of equipment bought was a manure spreader.
